verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> Therefore thou son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> against גּ֔וֹג <WH1463> against Gog וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> and say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> I am against גּ֔וֹג <WH1463> Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <WH5387> prince רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <WH4902> of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <WH8422> and Tubal

וְשֹׁבַבְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH7725> And I will turn thee back וְשִׁשֵּׁאתִ֔יךָ <WH8338> and leave but the sixth part וְהַעֲלִיתִ֖יךָ <WH5927> of thee and will cause thee to come up מִיַּרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> parts צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> from the north וַהֲבִאוֹתִ֖ךָ <WH935> and will bring עַל־ <WH5921> against הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> thee upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <WH5221> And I will smite קַשְׁתְּךָ֖ <WH7198> thy bow מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> hand שְׂמֹאולֶ֑ךָ <WH8040> out of thy left וְחִצֶּ֕יךָ <WH2671> and will cause thine arrows מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> hand יְמִינְךָ֖ <WH3225> out of thy right אַפִּֽיל׃ <WH5307> to fall

עַל־ <WH5921> on הָרֵ֨י <WH2022> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel תִּפּ֗וֹל <WH5307> Thou shalt fall אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <WH102> thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for לְעֵ֨יט <WH5861> thee unto the ravenous צִפּ֧וֹר <WH6833> birds כָּל־ <WH3605> to every כָּנָ֛ף <WH3671> of every sort וְחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> and [to] the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of the field נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <WH5414> that [is] with thee I will give לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> to be devoured

עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> field תִּפּ֑וֹל <WH5307> Thou shalt fall כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> is I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <WH7971> And I will send אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> a fire בְּמָג֔וֹג <WH4031> on Magog וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> and among them that dwell הָאִיִּ֖ים <WH339> in the isles לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> carelessly וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֨ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁ֜י <WH6944> So will I make my holy אוֹדִ֗יעַ <WH3045> known בְּתוֹךְ֙ <WH8432> in the midst עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אַחֵ֥ל <WH2490> and I will not [let them] pollute אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁם־ <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁ֖י <WH6944> my holy ע֑וֹד <WH5750> anymore וְיָדְע֤וּ <WH3045> shall know הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> any more and the heathen כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold בָאָה֙ <WH935> Behold it is come וְנִֽהְיָ֔תָה <WH1961> and it is done נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> GOD ה֥וּא <WH1931> That הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> this [is] the day אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> of which דִּבַּֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1696> whereof I have spoken

וְֽיָצְא֞וּ <WH3318> shall go forth יֹשְׁבֵ֣י ׀ <WH3427> And they that dwell עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> in the cities יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבִעֲר֡וּ <WH1197> and shall set וְ֠הִשִּׂיקוּ <WH5400> and burn בְּנֶ֨שֶׁק <WH5402> the weapons וּמָגֵ֤ן <WH4043> both the shields וְצִנָּה֙ <WH6793> and the bucklers בְּקֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> the bows וּבְחִצִּ֔ים <WH2671> and the arrows וּבְמַקֵּ֥ל <WH4731> war יָ֖ד <WH3027> able וּבְרֹ֑מַח <WH7420> and the spears וּבִעֲר֥וּ <WH1197> and they shall burn בָהֶ֛ם אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> on fire שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> They will not יִשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> So that they shall take עֵצִ֜ים <WH6086> no wood מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> out of the field וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> or יַחְטְבוּ֙ <WH2404> neither cut down מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיְּעָרִ֔ים <WH3293> [any] out of the forests כִּ֥י <WH3588> with בַנֶּ֖שֶׁק <WH5402> the weapons יְבַֽעֲרוּ־ <WH1197> for they shall burn אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire וְשָׁלְל֣וּ <WH7997> and they shall spoil אֶת־ <WH853> שֹׁלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH7997> those that spoiled וּבָֽזְזוּ֙ <WH962> them and rob אֶת־ <WH853> בֹּ֣זְזֵיהֶ֔ם <WH962> those that robbed נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> them saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD ס

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֡וּא <WH1931> I אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> [that] I will give לְגוֹג֩ ׀ <WH1463> unto Gog מְקֽוֹם־ <WH4725> a place שָׁ֨ם <WH8033> there קֶ֜בֶר <WH6913> there of graves בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> in Israel גֵּ֤י <WH1516> the valley הָעֹֽבְרִים֙ <WH5674> of the passengers קִדְמַ֣ת <WH6926> on the east הַיָּ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea וְחֹסֶ֥מֶת <WH2629> and it shall stop הִ֖יא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹֽבְרִ֑ים <WH5674> the [noses] of the passengers וְקָ֣בְרוּ <WH6912> and there shall they bury שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> גּוֹג֙ <WH1463> Gog וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הֲמוֹנֹ֔ה <WH1995> and all his multitude וְקָ֣רְא֔וּ <WH7121> and they shall call גֵּ֖יא <WH1516> [it] The valley הֲמ֥וֹן גּֽוֹג׃ <WH1996> of Hamongog

וּקְבָרוּם֙ <WH6912> be burying בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> shall the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לְמַ֖עַן <WH4616> order טַהֵ֣ר <WH2891> of them that they may cleanse אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> And seven חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <WH2320> months

וְקָֽבְרוּ֙ <WH6912> shall bury כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַ֣ם <WH5971> Yea all the people הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לָהֶ֖ם לְשֵׁ֑ם <WH8034> [them] and it shall be to them a renown י֚וֹם <WH3117> the day הִכָּ֣בְדִ֔י <WH3513> that I shall be glorified נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְאַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> men תָמִ֤יד <WH8548> of continual employment יַבְדִּ֙ילוּ֙ <WH914> And they shall sever out עֹבְרִ֣ים <WH5674> passing through בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land מְקַבְּרִ֣ים <WH6912> to bury אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹבְרִ֗ים <WH5674> with the passengers אֶת־ <WH853> הַנּוֹתָרִ֛ים <WH3498> those that remain עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth לְטַֽהֲרָ֑הּ <WH2891> to cleanse מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> it after the end שִׁבְעָֽה־ <WH7651> of seven חֳדָשִׁ֖ים <WH2320> months יַחְקֹֽרוּ׃ <WH2713> shall they search

וְעָבְר֤וּ <WH5674> And the passengers הָעֹֽבְרִים֙ <WH5674> [that] pass through בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וְרָאָה֙ <WH7200> when [any] seeth עֶ֣צֶם <WH6106> bone אָדָ֔ם <WH120> a man's וּבָנָ֥ה <WH1129> then shall he set up אֶצְל֖וֹ <WH681> by צִיּ֑וּן <WH6725> a sign עַ֣ד <WH5704> until קָבְר֤וּ <WH6912> it till the buriers אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> הַֽמְקַבְּרִ֔ים <WH6912> have buried אֶל־ <WH413> about גֵּ֖יא <WH1516> it in the valley הֲמ֥וֹן גּֽוֹג׃ <WH1996> of Hamongog
וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> and even שֶׁם־ <WH8034> And also the name עִ֛יר <WH5892> of the city הֲמוֹנָ֖ה <WH1997> [shall be] Hamonah וְטִהֲר֥וּ <WH2891> Thus shall they cleanse הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land ס

וְאַתָּ֨ה <WH859> you בֶן־ <WH1121> And thou son אָדָ֜ם <WH120> of man כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אֱמֹר֩ <WH559> Speak לְצִפּ֨וֹר <WH6833> fowl כָּל־ <WH3605> to every כָּנָ֜ף <WH3671> unto every feathered וּלְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> every חַיַּ֣ת <WH2416> and to every beast הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field הִקָּבְצ֤וּ <WH6908> Assemble וָבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> yourselves and come הֵאָסְפ֣וּ <WH622> gather מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> yourselves on every side עַל־ <WH5921> unto זִבְחִ֗י <WH2077> to my sacrifice אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אֲנִ֜י <WH589> I am זֹבֵ֤חַ <WH2076> that I do sacrifice לָכֶם֙ זֶ֣בַח <WH2077> sacrifice גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> for you [even] a great עַ֖ל <WH5921> on הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֥ם <WH398> that ye may eat בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> flesh וּשְׁתִ֥יתֶם <WH8354> and drink דָּֽם׃ <WH1818> blood

בְּשַׂ֤ר <WH1320> the flesh גִּבּוֹרִים֙ <WH1368> of the mighty תֹּאכֵ֔לוּ <WH398> Ye shall eat וְדַם־ <WH1818> the blood נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <WH5387> of the princes הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the earth תִּשְׁתּ֑וּ <WH8354> and drink אֵילִ֨ים <WH352> of rams כָּרִ֤ים <WH3733> of lambs וְעַתּוּדִים֙ <WH6260> and of goats פָּרִ֔ים <WH6499> of bullocks מְרִיאֵ֥י <WH4806> all of them fatlings בָשָׁ֖ן <WH1316> of Bashan כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

וַאֲכַלְתֶּם־ <WH398> And ye shall eat חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> fat לְשָׂבְעָ֔ה <WH7654> till ye be full וּשְׁתִ֥יתֶם <WH8354> and drink דָּ֖ם <WH1818> blood לְשִׁכָּר֑וֹן <WH7943> till ye be drunken מִזִּבְחִ֖י <WH2077> of my sacrifice אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which זָבַ֥חְתִּי <WH2076> which I have sacrificed לָכֶֽם׃

וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֤ם <WH7646> Thus ye shall be filled עַל־ <WH5921> at שֻׁלְחָנִי֙ <WH7979> at my table ס֣וּס <WH5483> with horses וָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> and chariots גִּבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> with mighty men וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and with all men מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of war נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> And I will set אֶת־ <WH853> כְּבוֹדִ֖י <WH3519> my glory בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> among the heathen וְרָא֣וּ <WH7200> shall see כָל־ <WH3605> and all הַגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> and all the heathen אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטִי֙ <WH4941> my judgment אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> that I have executed וְאֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֖י <WH3027> and my hand אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שַׂ֥מְתִּי <WH7760> that I have laid בָהֶֽם׃

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> shall know בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> So the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God מִן־ <WH4480> that הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> from that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he וָהָֽלְאָה׃ <WH1973> and forward

וְיָדְע֣וּ <WH3045> shall know הַ֠גּוֹיִם <WH1471> And the heathen כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בַעֲוֹנָ֞ם <WH5771> for their iniquity גָּל֣וּ <WH1540> went into captivity בֵֽית־ <WH1004> that the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֚ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they מָֽעֲלוּ־ <WH4603> because they trespassed בִ֔י וָאַסְתִּ֥ר <WH5641> against me therefore hid פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> I my face מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> like וָֽאֶתְּנֵם֙ <WH5414> from them and gave בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> them into the hand צָרֵיהֶ֔ם <WH6862> of their enemies וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> so fell בַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> they all by the sword כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> and all

כְּטֻמְאָתָ֥ם <WH2932> According to their uncleanness וּכְפִשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6588> and according to their transgressions עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> have I done אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וָאַסְתִּ֥ר <WH5641> unto them and hid פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> my face מֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> like ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now אָשִׁיב֙ <WH7725> Now will I bring again אֶת־ <WH853> [שְׁבִית כ] (שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> captive ק) יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְרִֽחַמְתִּ֖י <WH7355> and have mercy כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> upon the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְקִנֵּאתִ֖י <WH7065> and will be jealous לְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <WH6944> for my holy

וְנָשׂוּ֙ <WH5375> After that they have borne אֶת־ <WH853> כְּלִמָּתָ֔ם <WH3639> their shame וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מַעֲלָ֖ם <WH4603> whereby they have trespassed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which מָעֲלוּ־ <WH4604> and all their trespasses בִ֑י בְּשִׁבְתָּ֧ם <WH3427> against me when they dwelt עַל־ <WH5921> on אַדְמָתָ֛ם <WH127> in their land לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> safely וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> and none made [them] afraid

בְּשׁוֹבְבִ֤י <WH7725> When I have brought them again אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <WH6908> and gathered אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> מֵֽאַרְצ֖וֹת <WH776> lands אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֑ם <WH341> them out of their enemies' וְנִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <WH6942> and am sanctified בָ֔ם לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in them in the sight הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> of many

וְיָדְע֗וּ <WH3045> Then shall they know כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God בְּהַגְלוֹתִ֤י <WH1540> which caused them to be led into captivity אֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> among הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the heathen וְכִנַּסְתִּ֖ים <WH3664> but I have gathered עַל־ <WH5921> their own אַדְמָתָ֑ם <WH127> them unto their own land וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> none אוֹתִ֥יר <WH3498> and have left ע֛וֹד <WH5750> any מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> of them שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אַסְתִּ֥יר <WH5641> Neither will I hide ע֛וֹד <WH5750> any פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> my face מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> for אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> I שָׁפַ֤כְתִּי <WH8210> any more from them for I have poured out אֶת־ <WH853> רוּחִי֙ <WH7307> my spirit עַל־ <WH5921> on בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> upon the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
